DOC.brief_title: Hatha Yoga Exercises Pelvic Lumbar Back Pain Pregnant Woman
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES General Purpose Identify percentage pregnant woman spinal postural pain antenatal service city Paulinia evaluate effectiveness Classical Yoga exercise lumbar posterior pelvic pain group woman exercise , well development pain intensity patient without exercise . Specific Objectives - Identify percentage pregnant woman postural pain spine . - Measure intensity pain begin end intervention group . - Measure intensity pain begin end exercise session . - To compare evolution pain - low back posterior pelvic pain - group without exercise . - To compare evolution pain - low back posterior pelvic pain - group Yoga exercise . ASSUMPTIONS - Half pregnant woman report symptoms postural pain spine . - A significantly high percentage pregnant woman Yoga exercise pregnancy report improvement pain intensity - low back / posterior pelvic pain - compare control group . - A significantly high percentage pregnant woman present pain intensity increase begin compare end session . - A significantly high percentage pregnant woman report decrease intensity back pain posterior pelvic pain compare control group . - A significantly high percentage pregnant woman report improvement low back pain posterior pelvic pain group Yoga exercise . SUBJECTS AND METHODS : Design Identification percentage pregnant woman postural pain spine health unit clinical trial , prospective , randomize control . Sample Size To calculate sample size calculated average change pain intensity refer global active stretch group end first eighth week treatment . The mean standard deviation intensity pain end first week 4.88 SD 3.056 end eighth week 0.85 SD 1.875 ( Martins & PINTO E SILVA , 2005 b ) The assumption effect treatment yoga similar find global active stretching . Considering significance level 5 % , test power 80 % , base mean difference report adopt paired t-test , small sample size require n = 7 woman group . However , purpose research publication suggest adopt `` n '' great 30 woman per group .
